name: AgeSmart
0:
”Alexa, open age smart.”
”Take a memory assessment.”
”Play a game.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: age smart
Developer Terms of Use
des: Age Smart can both assess and help improve your memory with fun games and tests. It is designed with senior citizens in mind. Studies have shown that practicing memorization can allow seniors elderly adults to delay typical cognitive decline by seven to 14 years. Fun games and assessment tools make getting these workouts easy!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
